name: Block Blitz (NAT0P0TAT0)
description:
Block Blitz is a casual tile-based arcade/puzzle game, like bejeweled or puyo puyo.

In the game coloured blocks are gradually spawned at the bottom of the screen and move towards the top, you must prevent them from reaching the top by shooting balls of various colours at them.

Ordinary coloured blocks are destroyed by balls of the same colour, however there are a few special types of blocks and balls which do different things, like rainbow and bomb blocks.

It uses GameJolts API for the scoreboard, so you'll have to log in with a GameJolt account if you want to add your score to the online scoreboard.

Music: Jump Up (modified to loop) from http://www.purple-planet.com
